# Copilot Instructions for Starhauler

## Project Overview
Starhauler is a space logistics game where players pick up and deliver goods around the universe.

## Development Guidelines

### Code Style
- Write clear, maintainable code
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic
- Follow language-specific best practices

### Documentation
- Keep README.md up to date with any major changes
- Document new features and API changes
- Include usage examples where appropriate

### Git Workflow
- Write clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep commits focused and atomic
- Reference issue numbers in commits when applicable

### General Principles
- Prioritize code readability and maintainability
- Test changes before committing
- Consider edge cases and error handling
- Follow the principle of least surprise

## Project-Specific Notes
- This is a game development project focused on space logistics
- User experience and gameplay should be prioritized
- Performance matters for game mechanics
